person.name: impshum
person.bio: If it wasn't for those damn whelks!

files.content:
#!/usr/bin/python
# coding=utf-8
#
# <bitbar.title>Ripplecoin Ticker (£1GBP)</bitbar.title>
# <bitbar.version>v1.0</bitbar.version>
# <bitbar.author>impshum</bitbar.author>
# <bitbar.author.github>impshum</bitbar.author.github>
# <bitbar.desc>Displays current Ripplecoin price for £1 from Coinmarketcap</bitbar.desc>
# <bitbar.image></bitbar.image>
#
# by impshum

from urllib import urlopen
url = urlopen('https://coinmarketcap-nexuist.rhcloud.com/api/xrp').read()

import json
result = json.loads(url)

def flow():
    if result ['change'] > '0':
        print (' £%.4f |  color=#000000'% float(result['price']['gbp']))
    else:
        print (' £%.4f |  color=#000000'% float(result['price']['gbp']))

flow()

#!/usr/bin/python
# coding=utf-8
#
# <bitbar.title>Ripplecoin Ticker ($1USD)</bitbar.title>
# <bitbar.version>v1.0</bitbar.version>
# <bitbar.author>impshum</bitbar.author>
# <bitbar.author.github>impshum</bitbar.author.github>
# <bitbar.desc>Displays current Ripplecoin price for $1 from Coinmarketcap</bitbar.desc>
# <bitbar.image>http://i.imgur.com/2xOj6Pu.jpg</bitbar.image>
#
# by impshum

from urllib import urlopen
url = urlopen('https://coinmarketcap-nexuist.rhcloud.com/api/xrp').read()

import json
result = json.loads(url)

def flow():
    if result ['change'] > '0':
        print (' $%.4f |  color=#000000'% float(result['price']['usd']))
    else:
        print (' $%.4f |  color=#000000'% float(result['price']['usd']))

flow()

#!/usr/bin/python
# coding=utf-8
#
# <bitbar.title>Faith in humanity score</bitbar.title>
# <bitbar.version>v1.0</bitbar.version>
# <bitbar.author>impshum</bitbar.author>
# <bitbar.author.github>impshum</bitbar.author.github>
# <bitbar.desc>Displays current score from https://faithinhumanityscore.com</bitbar.desc>
#
# by impshum

from requests import get

data = get('https://faithinhumanityscore.com/api.php').json()
score = data['score']
print(score)

#!/usr/bin/python
# coding=utf-8
#
# <bitbar.title>Dogecoin coin Ticker ($1USD)</bitbar.title>
# <bitbar.version>v1.1</bitbar.version>
# <bitbar.author>impshum</bitbar.author>
# <bitbar.author.github>impshum</bitbar.author.github>
# <bitbar.desc>Displays current Dogecoin price for $1 from Coinmarketcap.com</bitbar.desc>
# <bitbar.image>http://i.imgur.com/FBUh3fk.jpg</bitbar.image>
#
# by impshum

from urllib import urlopen
url = urlopen('https://api.coinmarketcap.com/v1/ticker/dogecoin/').read()

import json
result = json.loads(url)

def flow():

    if result[0]['percent_change_24h'] > '0':
        print (' $%.4f |  color=#000000'% float(result[0]['price_usd']))
    else:
        print (' $%.4f |  color=#000000'% float(result[0]['price_usd']))

flow()

plugins.title: Dogecoin coin Ticker ($1USD)
plugins.author: impshum

authors.name: impshum
authors.bio: If it wasn't for those damn whelks!

plugins.desc: Displays current Dogecoin price for $1 from Coinmarketcap.com
